HDG.WM.content: [thing in mind, “idea”] try to obtain the nothing as if beings are already obtaining [?] > can never comprehend absolutely whole of beings in themselves, we find ourselves stationed in midst of beings unveiled somehow as whole [how? because Being is presupposed?], no matter how fragmented, we deal w/ beings in unity of the “whole” (even when we cling to particular being [Levinas, face]) > boredom manifests beings as a whole > finding ourselves attuned unveils beings as a whole, fundamental occurrence of our Dasein
HDG.WM.linkedContent: [thing in mind, “idea”] try to obtain the nothing as if beings are already obtaining [?] > can never comprehend absolutely whole of beings in themselves, we find ourselves stationed in midst of beings unveiled somehow as whole [how? because Being is presupposed?], no matter how fragmented, we deal w/ beings in unity of the “whole” (even when we cling to particular being [Levinas, face]) > boredom manifests beings as a whole > finding ourselves attuned unveils beings as a whole, fundamental occurrence of our Dasein

HDG.FS.content: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen
HDG.FS.linkedContent: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen

HDG.LP.content: turmoil, curse, [2nd blow], carries each kind (Geschlechter) into irreconcilable split, fragmented stamp, so cleft in 2, can’t find its proper cast (rechter Schlag) [differance not primary for Heidegger here] > the duality of proper cast leaves discord behind, leading into gentleness of simple twofoldness (einfältigen Zwiefalt) [Schelling’s indifference point? sexual difference that isn’t the discord of sexual duality], follows the stranger
HDG.LP.linkedContent: turmoil, curse, [2nd blow], carries each kind (Geschlechter) into irreconcilable split, fragmented stamp, so cleft in 2, can’t find its proper cast (rechter Schlag) [differance not primary for Heidegger here] > the duality of proper cast leaves discord behind, leading into gentleness of simple twofoldness (einfältigen Zwiefalt) [Schelling’s indifference point? sexual difference that isn’t the discord of sexual duality], follows the stranger

HDG.LP.content: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]
